definitions.definition: (of a place) able to be reached or entered.
examples: the town is accessible by bus
synonyms: available; informalget-at-able "the village is accessible only on foot"

definitions.definition: (of an object, service, or facility) able to be easily obtained or used.
examples: making learning opportunities more accessible to adults
his Latin grammar is lucid and accessible
synonyms: intelligible; formalexoteric "his accessible style of writing"

definitions.definition: able to be reached or entered by people who have a disability.
examples: features such as nonslip floors and accessible entrances

definitions.definition: (of a person, typically one in a position of authority or importance) friendly and easy to talk to; approachable.
examples: he is more accessible than most tycoons
